titleStmt.title: A proclamation, adjourning the parliament from the tenth of July, to the sixth of December, 1683
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the sixteenth day of August, one thousand six hundred eighty and three, and of Our Reign, the thirtieth and fifth year.
Signed: Pat. Menzies, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
